h3_title: Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Any time you manage to knock the dragon to the ground, quickly capitalize on the moment with Spirit Attacks and as many hits as you can unleash, using Immobilize to keep her grounded for a long as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Any time you manage to knock the dragon to the ground, quickly capitalize on the moment with Spirit Attacks and as many hits as you can unleash, using Immobilize to keep her grounded for a long as possible.
